Package org.eclipse.jetty.runner

Class Runner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jetty.runner.Runner

  • public class Runner
extends java.lang.Object
    Runner

    Combine jetty classes into a single executable jar and run webapps based on the args to it.
